design_philosophy.description: A pristine, high-contrast workspace that feels like a professional photo studio. White backgrounds, deep slate text, and electric indigo accents to signify AI power. The interface disappears to let the product images shine.

scale.h1: text-5xl md:text-6xl lg:text-7xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-none
scale.caption: text-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-slate-500

grid_system.landing_bento: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 md:gap-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/20 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 shadow-sm transition-all
buttons.cta_gradient: bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-600 to-violet-600 text-white shadow-xl shadow-indigo-500/30 hover:shadow-indigo-500/40 hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all

cards.feature: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-xl shadow-slate-200/40 rounded-3xl p-8 hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-slate-200/50 transition-all duration-300
cards.pricing: relative overflow-hidden bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-3xl p-8 hover:border-indigo-200 transition-colors
cards.dashboard_panel: bg-white border-r border-slate-200 h-full flex flex-col

inputs.default: h-11 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-100 focus:border-indigo-500 transition-all text-slate-900 placeholder:text-slate-400

navigation.marketing_nav: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-100
navigation.dashboard_sidebar: bg-slate-50 border-r border-slate-200 w-72 h-screen p-4 flex flex-col gap-2

editor_workspace.canvas_area: bg-slate-100/50 flex-1 flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden pattern-grid-lg
editor_workspace.toolbar_floating: absolute bottom-8 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-2xl rounded-full px-6 py-3 flex gap-4 items-center

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.03'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

hero_main.alt: Professional camera studio setup showing high quality output
hero_main.usage: Hero section main visual, potentially with a split reveal effect

feature_lifestyle.usage: Example of AI generated lifestyle context

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL FONTS: Ensure Outfit and Inter are imported in index.css immediately.
THEME: Strict Light Mode. Do not implement dark mode toggles unless explicitly requested. The 'Studio' vibe requires white.
LAYOUT: Use the 'Dashboard Layout' grid for the main app (Sidebar Left + Main Canvas + Properties Right).
COMPONENT: Use 'Sonner' for all toast notifications (success/error).
COMPONENT: Build a 'BeforeAfterSlider' component for the image preview if possible, or use side-by-side comparison.
INTERACTION: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons and inputs (e.g., 'upload-btn', 'generate-bg-btn').
STYLE: Avoid default gray borders. Use 'border-slate-200' or 'border-slate-100' for subtle separation.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text on white backgrounds is at least Slate-600 or darker.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for floating panels.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or rounded-lg).
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover states, transitions).
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
